verses.verse: וּכְהִתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <WH6419> had prayed עֶזְרָא֙ <WH5830> Now when Ezra וּכְ֨הִתְוַדֹּת֔וֹ <WH3034> and when he had confessed בֹּכֶה֙ <WH1058> weeping וּמִתְנַפֵּ֔ל <WH5307> and casting himself down לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God נִקְבְּצוּ֩ <WH6908> there assembled אֵלָ֨יו <WH413> to him מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> unto him out of Israel קָהָ֣ל <WH6951> congregation רַב־ <WH7227> great מְאֹ֗ד <WH3966> a very אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH582> of men וְנָשִׁים֙ <WH802> and women וִֽילָדִ֔ים <WH3206> and children כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָכ֥וּ <WH1058> wept הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> for the people הַרְבֵּה־ <WH7235> very בֶֽכֶה׃ <WH1059> sore ס

וַיַּעַן֩ <WH6030> answered שְׁכַנְיָ֨ה <WH7935> And Shechaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְחִיאֵ֜ל <WH3171> of Jehiel מִבְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> [one] of the sons [עֹולָם כ] (עֵילָם֙ <WH5867> Elam ק) וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לְעֶזְרָ֔א <WH5830> unto Ezra אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> we מָעַ֣לְנוּ <WH4603> We have trespassed בֵאלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> against our God וַנֹּ֛שֶׁב <WH3427> and have taken נָשִׁ֥ים <WH802> wives נָכְרִיּ֖וֹת <WH5237> strange מֵעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> of the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> now יֵשׁ־ <WH3426> yet now there is מִקְוֶ֥ה <WH4723> hope לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in Israel עַל־ <WH5921> spite זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> So

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now נִֽכְרָת־ <WH3772> Now therefore let us make בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> a covenant לֵ֠אלֹהֵינוּ <WH430> with our God לְהוֹצִ֨יא <WH3318> to put away כָל־ <WH3605> all נָשִׁ֜ים <WH802> all the wives וְהַנּוֹלָ֤ד <WH3205> and such as are born מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> according בַּעֲצַ֣ת <WH6098> of them according to the counsel אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH113> master וְהַחֲרֵדִ֖ים <WH2730> and of those that tremble בְּמִצְוַ֣ת <WH4687> at the commandment אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> of our God וְכַתּוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> according to the law יֵעָשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> and let it be done

ק֛וּם <WH6965> Arise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָלֶ֥יךָ <WH5921> is your responsibility הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> for [this] matter וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> will be with חֲזַ֖ק <WH2388> [belongeth] unto thee we also [will be] with thee be of good courage וַעֲשֵֽׂה׃ <WH6213> and do פ

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> Then arose עֶזְרָ֡א <WH5830> Ezra וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> to swear אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵי֩ <WH8269> and made the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <WH3548> priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> the Levites וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> and all Israel לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <WH6213> that they should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> according to this word הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> to this וַיִּשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <WH7650> And they sware

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> rose up עֶזְרָ֗א <WH5830> Then Ezra מִלִּפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> from before בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <WH1980> and went אֶל־ <WH413> into לִשְׁכַּ֖ת <WH3957> into the chamber יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <WH3076> of Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְיָשִׁ֑יב <WH475> of Eliashib וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> there לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> no bread לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אָכַל֙ <WH398> thither he did eat וּמַ֣יִם <WH4325> water לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor שָׁתָ֔ה <WH8354> nor drink כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מִתְאַבֵּ֖ל <WH56> for he mourned עַל־ <WH5921> over מַ֥עַל <WH4604> because of the transgression הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> of them that had been carried away ס

וַיַּעֲבִ֨ירוּ <WH5674> made ק֜וֹל <WH6963> A proclamation בִּיהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> throughout Judah וִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> to all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto all the children הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> of the captivity לְהִקָּבֵ֖ץ <WH6908> that they should gather themselves together יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> unto Jerusalem

וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָב֜וֹא <WH935> And that whosoever would not come לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> within three הַיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> days כַּעֲצַ֤ת <WH6098> according to the counsel הַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> of the princes וְהַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> and the elders יָחֳרַ֖ם <WH2763> should be forfeited כָּל־ <WH3605> all רְכוּשׁ֑וֹ <WH7399> all his substance וְה֥וּא <WH1931> himself יִבָּדֵ֖ל <WH914> and himself separated מִקְּהַ֥ל <WH6951> from the congregation הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1473> of those that had been carried away ס

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> gathered themselves together כָל־ <WH3605> all אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH376> the men יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֨ן ׀ <WH1144> and Benjamin יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> within three הַיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> days ה֛וּא <WH1931> he חֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַתְּשִׁיעִ֖י <WH8671> It [was] the ninth בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> on the twentieth בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> sat כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> and all the people בִּרְחוֹב֙ <WH7339> in the street בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God מַרְעִידִ֥ים <WH7460> trembling עַל־ <WH5921> because הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> because of [this] matter וּמֵהַגְּשָׁמִֽים׃ <WH1653> and for the great rain פ

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> stood up עֶזְרָ֤א <WH5830> And Ezra הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> You מְעַלְתֶּ֔ם <WH4603> unto them Ye have transgressed וַתֹּשִׁ֖יבוּ <WH3427> and have taken נָשִׁ֣ים <WH802> wives נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <WH5237> strange לְהוֹסִ֖יף <WH3254> to increase עַל־ <WH5921> unto אַשְׁמַ֥ת <WH819> the trespass יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now תְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> Now therefore make תוֹדָ֛ה <WH8426> confession לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> of your fathers וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and do רְצוֹנ֑וֹ <WH7522> his pleasure וְהִבָּֽדְלוּ֙ <WH914> and separate מֵעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> yourselves from the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> wives הַנָּכְרִיּֽוֹת׃ <WH5237> and from the strange

וַיַּֽעְנ֧וּ <WH6030> answered כָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַקָּהָ֛ל <WH6951> Then all the congregation וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and said ק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> with a loud כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that [כְּדִבְרֶיךָ כ] (כִּדְבָרְךָ֥ <WH1697> act ק) עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> is our duty לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> so must we do

אֲבָ֞ל <WH61> But הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> the people רָב֙ <WH7227> [are] many וְהָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and [it is] a time גְּשָׁמִ֔ים <WH1653> of much rain וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> are not כֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> and we are not able לַעֲמ֣וֹד <WH5975> to stand בַּח֑וּץ <WH2351> without וְהַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <WH4399> neither [is this] a work לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor לְי֤וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָד֙ <WH259> of one וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor לִשְׁנַ֔יִם <WH8147> or two כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִרְבִּ֥ינוּ <WH7235> for we are many לִפְשֹׁ֖עַ <WH6586> that have transgressed בַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> in this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

יַֽעֲמְדוּ־ <WH5975> stand נָ֣א <WH4994> Let שָׂ֠רֵינוּ <WH8269> Let now our rulers לְֽכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הַקָּהָ֞ל <WH6951> of all the congregation וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> those בֶּעָרֵ֗ינוּ <WH5892> in our cities הַהֹשִׁ֞יב <WH3427> and let all them which have taken נָשִׁ֤ים <WH802> wives נָכְרִיּוֹת֙ <WH5237> strange יָבֹא֙ <WH935> come לְעִתִּ֣ים <WH6256> times מְזֻמָּנִ֔ים <WH2163> at appointed וְעִמָּהֶ֛ם <WH5973> together זִקְנֵי־ <WH2205> and with them the elders עִ֥יר <WH5892> of every city וָעִ֖יר <WH5892> city וְשֹׁפְטֶ֑יהָ <WH8199> and the judges עַ֠ד <WH5704> until לְהָשִׁ֞יב <WH7725> be turned חֲר֤וֹן <WH2740> thereof until the fierce אַף־ <WH639> wrath אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> of our God מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at עַ֖ד <WH5704> account לַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> for this matter הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> of this פ

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Only יוֹנָתָ֧ן <WH3129> Only Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲשָׂהאֵ֛ל <WH6214> of Asahel וְיַחְזְיָ֥ה <WH3167> and Jahaziah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son תִּקְוָ֖ה <WH8616> of Tikvah עָמְד֣וּ <WH5975> were employed עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹ֑את <WH2063> with וּמְשֻׁלָּ֛ם <WH4918> about this [matter] and Meshullam וְשַׁבְּתַ֥י <WH7678> and Shabbethai הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> the Levite עֲזָרֻֽם׃ <WH5826> helped

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did so כֵן֮ <WH3651> so בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children הַגּוֹלָה֒ <WH1473> of the captivity וַיִּבָּדְלוּ֩ <WH914> were separated עֶזְרָ֨א <WH5830> And Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH376> men רָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> chief הָאָב֛וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> after the house אֲבֹתָ֖ם <WH1> of their fathers וְכֻלָּ֣ם <WH3605> all בְּשֵׁמ֑וֹת <WH8034> and all of them by [their] names וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <WH3427> and sat down בְּי֤וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָד֙ <WH259> in the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָעֲשִׂירִ֔י <WH6224> of the tenth לְדַרְי֖וֹשׁ <WH1875> to examine הַדָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> the matter

וַיְכַלּ֣וּ <WH3615> And they made an end בַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> all אֲנָשִׁ֕ים <WH376> the men הַהֹשִׁ֖יבוּ <WH3427> that had taken נָשִׁ֣ים <WH802> wives נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <WH5237> strange עַ֛ד <WH5704> against י֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> by the first לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> of the first פ

וַיִּמָּצֵא֙ <WH4672> there were found מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And among the sons הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הֹשִׁ֖יבוּ <WH3427> that had taken נָשִׁ֣ים <WH802> wives נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <WH5237> strange מִבְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> [namely] of the sons יֵשׁ֤וּעַ <WH3442> of Jeshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֽוֹצָדָק֙ <WH3136> of Jozadak וְאֶחָ֔יו <WH251> and his brethren מַֽעֲשֵׂיָה֙ <WH4641> Maaseiah וֶֽאֱלִיעֶ֔זֶר <WH461> and Eliezer וְיָרִ֖יב <WH3402> and Jarib וּגְדַלְיָֽה׃ <WH1436> and Gedaliah

וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> And they gave יָדָ֖ם <WH3027> their hands לְהוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> that they would put away נְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <WH802> their wives וַאֲשֵׁמִ֥ים <WH818> and [being] guilty אֵֽיל־ <WH352> [they offered] a ram צֹ֖אן <WH6629> of the flock עַל־ <WH5921> for אַשְׁמָתָֽם׃ <WH819> for their trespass ס
וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And of the sons אִמֵּ֔ר <WH564> of Immer חֲנָ֖נִי <WH2607> Hanani וּזְבַדְיָֽה׃ <WH2069> and Zebadiah ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> And of the sons חָרִ֑ם <WH2766> of Harim מַעֲשֵׂיָ֤ה <WH4641> Maaseiah וְאֵֽלִיָּה֙ <WH452> and Elijah וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֔ה <WH8098> and Shemaiah וִיחִיאֵ֖ל <WH3171> and Jehiel וְעֻזִיָּֽה׃ <WH5818> and Uzziah

וּמִבְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> And of the sons פַּשְׁח֑וּר <WH6583> of Pashur אֶלְיוֹעֵינַ֤י <WH454> Elioenai מַֽעֲשֵׂיָה֙ <WH4641> Maaseiah יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> Ishmael נְתַנְאֵ֔ל <WH5417> Nethaneel יוֹזָבָ֖ד <WH3107> Jozabad וְאֶלְעָשָֽׂה׃ <WH501> and Elasah ס

וּמִֽן־ <WH4480> at הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> Also of the Levites יוֹזָבָ֣ד <WH3107> Jozabad וְשִׁמְעִ֗י <WH8096> and Shimei וְקֵֽלָיָה֙ <WH7041> and Kelaiah ה֣וּא <WH1931> he קְלִיטָ֔א <WH7042> Kelita פְּתַֽחְיָ֥ה <WH6611> Pethakiah יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> Judah וֶאֱלִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <WH461> and Eliezer ס

וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <WH7891> Of the singers אֶלְיָשִׁ֑יב <WH475> also Eliashib וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <WH7778> and of the porters שַׁלֻּ֥ם <WH7967> Shallum וָטֶ֖לֶם <WH2928> and Telem וְאוּרִֽי׃ <WH221> and Uri ס

וּמִֽיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Moreover of Israel מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons פַרְעֹ֡שׁ <WH6551> of Parosh רַ֠מְיָה <WH7422> Ramiah וְיִזִּיָּ֤ה <WH3150> and Jeziah וּמַלְכִּיָּה֙ <WH4441> and Malchiah וּמִיָּמִ֣ן <WH4326> and Miamin וְאֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> and Eleazar וּמַלְכִּיָּ֖ה <WH4441> and Malchijah וּבְנָיָֽה׃ <WH1141> and Benaiah ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> And of the sons עֵילָ֑ם <WH5867> of Elam מַתַּנְיָ֤ה <WH4983> Mattaniah זְכַרְיָה֙ <WH2148> Zechariah וִיחִיאֵ֣ל <WH3171> and Jehiel וְעַבְדִּ֔י <WH5660> and Abdi וִירֵמ֖וֹת <WH3406> and Jeremoth וְאֵלִיָּֽה׃ <WH452> and Eliah ס
